=How to build js object?=

Use syntax {{{new%js}}}:

Example:

<<code language="ocaml"|
let get_timestamp () =
  let date = new%js Js.date_now in
  int_of_float (Js.to_float (date##getTime))
>>

More details in documentation: <<a_api project="js_of_ocaml" text="Js object constructor"|val Js_of_ocaml.Js.constr>>
